summary.span: 控制惯性运动期间旋转操作的减速度。

span.span: Controls the deceleration of a rotation manipulation during inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类指定旋转操作延迟时的行为。The class specifies how a rotation manipulation behaves when it is inertia. 使用中的属性事件来执行以下操作：Use the property in the event to do the following: - 通过设置开始时指定惯性的初始速度属性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 惯性结束通过设置时指定所需操作旋转属性。Specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 通过设置指定所需的减速的惯性属性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 设置或，但不是两者。Set either the or the , but not both. 当你设置这些属性之一时，其他属性将更改为如果它的值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件处理程序和设置需要的减速转换、 扩展以及在惯性过程中使用的旋转。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 此示例摘自在更大的示例[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
